thread.title: Western Grocery Chain Fresh & Easy Will Close Its 97 Stores
thread.title_full: Western Grocery Chain Fresh & Easy Will Close Its 97 Stores - NBC News

author: Associated Press
title: Western Grocery Chain Fresh & Easy Will Close Its 97 Stores
text:
The company closed about 50 stores in March.
advertisement Fresh & Easy made a big splash when it opened in 2007, backed by British supermarket giant Tesco, which saw an opportunity to enter the U.S. market.
A customer leaves a Fresh and Easy grocery store on April 18, 2013, in San Francisco. Justin Sullivan / Getty Images, file California-based The Yucaipa Cos. bought the chain out of bankruptcy in 2013.
The Daily Breeze said layoffs are expected to begin a week from Friday.
